definitions.definition: The tort whereby a duty of reasonable care was breached , causing damage : any conduct short of intentional or reckless action that falls below the legal standard for preventing unreasonable injury.
The breach of a duty of care: the failure to exercise a standard of care that a reasonable person would have in a similar situation.
